post.description: Start pipeline execution with raw input, returns jobId that can be used as a reference for the pipeline to do actions such as results/status/stop, etc.

requestBody.description: an object representing all information needed for pipeline execution

post.description: Start pipeline execution when the name of the pipeline is known (/store/pipelines), all parameters in this action will be merged with the stored pipeline and then returns jobId that can be used as a reference for the pipeline to do actions such as results/status/stop, etc.

requestBody.description: an object representing all information needed for stored pipeline execution

post.description: call to stop the flow execution

get.description: returns a status for the current pipeline.
returns result for the execution of a specific pipeline run. if called before result is determined - returns error.
